xl_cheeselooks.

Take a look.

=== Concept ===
Merged menubar toolbar.  Smooth background gradients and slightly more glossy clickable widgets.

This is a new engine.  I quit developing it a while back because I bought a motorcycle and that has become my new hobby.

== Contributions ==
Get some themes here:
http://www.gnome-look.org/content/show.php/xl_cheeselooks+theme+pack?content=75868

Check below for the engine itself.

How do you make this garbage work?

cd to /gtk-enginesxl_cheese
./autogen.sh --prefix=/usr --enable-animation
make
sudo make install
